name: Neopets: The Darkest Faerie
description:
Two young heroes - Tormund the Knight and Roberta the Sorceress - must join forces to stop her evil plans. But are they too late?

Play as both Tormund and Roberta

Battle vicious Werelupes, mysterious Dark Knights, brutish Bandits, and many more!

See Meridell, Faerieland, and strange new lands.
